resources.string:
"Turn 'ON' the switch on the top right. ↗️⊙.⊙↗️ With accessibility authorization, you'll get the best typing experience on different apps!
Note: You may receive a system reminder about authorizing, Emoji Keyboard will NEVER collect ANY of your information."
